name: Extreme Bike Master Rider
description:
Extreme Bike Master Rider is about showing some furious rooftop shadow stunt while enjoying real bike physics on vast city roads. Jump high in the air through ramp placed on city roads. Enjoy Rooftop bike adventure, move from building to building without falling on the ground and perform some daring stunts! Each level in Extreme Bike Master Rider is challenging and exciting than the other.

All you need to have is perfect balance, riding skills and controls as you drive across the ramps, city traffic rush and other obstacles. There are amazing bikes that you can select and unlock. Play Extreme Bike Master Rider and show your super extreme rooftop bike stunt riding skills. Get ready for an amazing stunt drift riding adventure on grand city roads and prove that you are the real trail bike racer.

FEATURES:
Smooth and easy control
Newest stunts
Unique and heavy engine
Thrilling stunts &Effective sound effects
Latest and modern sports bikes
Amazing Environments
Real-time Bike Physics
